rule_name.option:
allowMissingPropertyJavadoc, Control whether to allow missing Javadoc on accessor methods for properties (setters and getters)., boolean, false
allowedAnnotations, Configure annotations that allow missed documentation., String[], Override
excludeScope, Specify the visibility scope where Javadoc comments are not checked., Scope, null
ignoreMethodNamesRegex, Ignore method whose names are matching specified regex., Pattern, null
minLineCount, Control the minimal amount of lines in method to allow no documentation., int, -1
scope, Specify the visibility scope where Javadoc comments are checked., Scope, public
tokens, tokens to check, subset of tokens
